kjv_def: become fool, make foolish, lose savour
strongs_def: to become insipid; figuratively, to make (passively, act) as a simpleton
outline:
1. to be foolish, to act foolishly
    1. to make foolish
      1. to prove a person or a thing foolish
    2. to make flat and tasteless
      1. of salt that has lost its strength and flavour
